import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { InnerLayout } from '../../styles/Layouts'; import Chart from '../Chart/Chart'; import { useGlobalContext } from '../../context/globalContext'; import { dollar } from '../../utils/Icons'; function Dashboard(){ const {totalExpenses, totalIncome, totalBalance} = useGlobalContext() return (

All Transactions

Total Income

{dollar} {totalIncome()}

Total Expenses

{dollar} {totalExpenses()}

Total Balance

{dollar} {totalBalance()}

) } const DashboardStyled = styled.div` `; export default Dashboard
